description: All numeric parameters are symbolic - no magic numbers

N_LONG_REPEAT.rationale: Length for long sequence tests, derived from typical paragraph size

N_STEPS.rationale: Number of steps for growth tests

STEP_SIZE.rationale: Increment per step, based on average sentence length

AROUSAL_UNIT.rationale: Binary arousal signal, tanh(AROUSAL_UNIT) = 0.7616 as deterministic baseline

DOMINANCE_NEUTRAL.rationale: Neutral baseline for dominance, documented choice

SARCASM_PENALTY.rationale: Divisor for sarcasm confidence reduction: conf * tanh(1/(1+flags))
